org.knime.core.node.port

extends Object
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Thorsten Meinl, KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PortTypeRegistry getInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance.
        Returns:
        the singlet data type registry

      • availablePortTypes

        public Collection<PortType> availablePortTypes()
        Returns a collection with all known data types (that registered at the extension point org.knime.core.DataType. The returned collection is not sorted in any particular order.
        Returns:
        a (possibly empty) collection with data types

      • getPortType

        public PortType getPortType(Class<? extends PortObject> portClass)
        Returns the port type for the given port object class.
        Parameters:
        portClass - any port object class, must not be null
        Returns:
        a port type, never null

      • getPortType

        public PortType getPortType(Class<? extends PortObject> portClass,
                            boolean isOptional)
        Returns the port type for the given port object class.
        Parameters:
        portClass - any port object class, must not be null
        isOptional - true for an optional port, false for a required port
        Returns:
        a port type, never null

      • getObjectClass

        public Optional<Class<? extends PortObject>> getObjectClass(String className)
        Returns the PortObject class for the given class name. This method looks through all registered PortObject implementations. If no port object implementation is found, an empty optional is returned.
        As a fallback mechanism, the GlobalClassCreator is used. This will be changed with the next major release.
        Parameters:
        className - a class name
        Returns:
        an optional containing the requested port object class
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if the loaded class does not extend PortObject

      • getSpecClass

        public Optional<Class<? extends PortObjectSpec>> getSpecClass(String className)
        Returns the DataCell class for the given class name. This method looks through all registered DataCell implementations. If no data cell implementation is found, an empty optional is returned.
        As a fallback mechanism, the GlobalClassCreator is used. This will be changed with the next major release.
        This method should only be used by DataType for creating data types that were saved to disc.
        Parameters:
        className - a class name
        Returns:
        an optional containing the requested data cell class
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if the loaded class does not extend DataCell

      • getObjectSerializer

        public Optional<PortObject.PortObjectSerializer<PortObject>> getObjectSerializer(Class<? extends PortObject> objectClass)
        Returns a serializer for the given port object class. If no serializer is available an empty optional is returned. Serializers are taken from the extension point org.knime.core.PortType and as fall back using buddy classloading. The fallback will be removed with the next major release.
        Parameters:
        objectClass - a data cell class
        Returns:
        an optional containing a serializer for the port object class

      • getSpecSerializer

        public Optional<PortObjectSpec.PortObjectSpecSerializer<PortObjectSpec>> getSpecSerializer(Class<? extends PortObjectSpec> specClass)
        Returns a serializer for the given port object spec class. If no serializer is available an empty optional is returned. Serializers are taken from the extension point org.knime.core.PortType and as fall back using buddy classloading. The fallback will be removed with the next major release.
        Parameters:
        specClass - a port object spec class
        Returns:
        an optional containing a serializer for the port object spec class
